personalInfo.name: Rijul Singla
personalInfo.tagline: Crafting immersive worlds and engaging gameplay experiences.

aboutMe: Hello! I'm Rijul Singla, a budding game developer with a passion for creating games.I specialize in Unity Engine development, C++, C#, game design, level design.

My journey into game development began with modding classic games, which quickly evolved into a deep dive into engine programming and game design principles. I love bringing ideas to life, solving complex challenges, and collaborating with creative minds.

When I'm not coding, you can find me playing games, streaming on youtube/twicth or listening to new music.I'm always eager to learn and grow, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in game development.

projects.title: Pringles:A Potato Revolution
contributions: This was my first ever proper solo project - where I developed this top-down endless runner game which is about a potato escaping from what's seemingly a prison and essentially a revolution that is about to change the history
This game has completely original lore written by me.

projects.title: Time Strider (Game Jam)
contributions: This game was made as a part of Micro Jam 034: Defense by me and chasingxstars
Programmed and Designed a tower defense game as you race against time

projects.title: Pigeon Patrol (Game Jam)
contributions: Conceptualized and rapidly prototyped core rogue-like mechanics.
Balanced character stats and enemy encounters for challenging gameplay.

projects.title: Shaolin Slice (Game Jam)
contributions: Developed a sophisticated behavior tree system for various enemy archetypes.
Implemented A* pathfinding with dynamic obstacle avoidance.
Integrated machine learning models for adaptive enemy difficulty.

testimonials.quote: Rijul Singla is an incredibly talented and dedicated game developer. Their ability to tackle complex technical challenges while maintaining a strong focus on player experience is truly impressive. A valuable asset to any team!
testimonials.title: Senior Game Producer at GameCo

testimonials.quote: Working with Rijul Singla was a pleasure. Their contributions to Cosmic Drift were crucial, especially in optimizing the rendering pipeline. They are a great communicator and a highly skilled programmer.
testimonials.title: Lead Engineer at IndieDev Studio

contact.introText: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to connect with me!
